name: crewmates on the screen
description:
last year (2020) ive been out of ideas and start to create screen pets, and i remember that  crewmates is a very wholesome character that eveyone loves, and so the crewmates on the screen was born!


Disclamer

I GNamimates do not own any of these sprites shown in the game
the sprites are owned by Innersloth team 
and I dont take ownership on their work,
sprites used are for entertainment purposes only,

check out their site at: https://www.innersloth.com/

Questions and Answers!what is this?

when running it, it will say unknown publisher, idk how to fix this, this wont risk anything in your desktop, ima fix this if i know how to :P

  • what does it do?

it runs around your screen and jumps when it wants to

  • how to turn it off!

simply right click it in the taskbar and click Close All windows

is should look like this:

  • can I interact with them?

yes, you can throw them around by holding mouse button and dragging them

  • what happens when they walk off my screen?

if you throw them out of your screen, they will just walk back to your screen! none of them will walk out of your screen, ive only made is so that they will only walk in the place where they are visible 

  • does it have hats?

yes, all the hats! even the crewmate and the balloon witch changes colors depending on the color of the crewmate!

  • can i run as many as I want?

yes, as long as your computer ram can handle it!

  • does this eat alot of ram?

i would say no, because i have 6 GB ram and i can run 15 of them, i would say only run 10 of them.

  • do I need to install this?

no, just extract the zip and run the file right away!

  • why dont you have any recording of this?

my computer cant handle recording, and if even i tried it will overheat, ill try to get a reconding if i can as soon as possible

  • is this a virus or why should I trust you?

this is my 2nd game ever made and if you wanna know what I use to make games its Godot engine, its an opensource game development software known by many and its purely made of that.

  • other question are gonna be answered in the comments!

ive spent the entire month making this as optimized as i can possibly can

the optimizations are

  1. when its not moving, the FPS drops to 2 to save battery life
  2. i cleaned up most of the variables
  3. when they are off screen their fps drops to 0 for battery life also
  4. the some of the scripts ony run 15 times a second

thats all and have fun!
